    "team_chat.channel_join_declined": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_declined",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_declined\nThe **Team Chat channel join declined** event triggers when the join request is declined. For the invitation workflow, it both needs the admin of the channel owner and requester to approve when the channel account and requester account enable the **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option. Also the join requster finally needs the channel owner to approve.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel join declined** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_declined`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who declined the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who declined the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who declined the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who declined the channel join request."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the request.",
                        "required": [
                          "requester",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization.",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "requester": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the requester.",
                            "required": [
                              "user_id",
                              "user_email",
                              "display_name",
                              "member_id"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "user_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The user ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel join request was declined, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat channel join request was declined."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The operation type of this event: \n* by_channel_owner_account_admin \u2014 The join request is approved or declined by channel owner account admin. \n* by_requester_account_admin \u2014 The join request is approved or declined by requester account admin. \n* by_channel_owner \u2014 The join request is approved or declined by channel owner.",
                            "enum": [
                              "by_channel_owner_account_admin",
                              "by_requester_account_admin",
                              "by_channel_owner"
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },

                }
              }
            }
          }

    "chat_channel.deleted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_channel"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_channel.deleted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.deleted\n\nThe **Chat Channel Deleted** event is triggered when a chat channel administrator deletes the channel.\n\nA chat channel administrator can delete a channel. Deleting a channel permanently removes **all** channel conversations, files, and other information. **There is no way to recover this information.**\n\nYou can manually delete a chat channel using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also delete a channel programmatically using the [**Delete a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/deleteUserLevelChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Channel Deleted** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:channel`,`team_chat:read:channel:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.deleted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who deleted the chat channel."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who deleted the chat channel.",
                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",

    "chat_message.deleted": {

        "operationId": "chat_message.deleted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_message.deleted\n\nThe **Chat Message Deleted** event is triggered when a user deletes a chat message that was previously sent to a contact or a chat channel.\n\nZoom users can delete messages previously sent to contacts and channels. When a user deletes a message, the message recipients will no longer be able to view the message. Users can manually delete messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also delete messages programmatically using the [**Delete a Message**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/deleteChatMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Message Deleted** subscription enabled under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_message:read:admin`,`chat_message:write:admin`,`chat_message:read`,`chat_message:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_message.deleted`\n",

            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [

                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

    "team_chat.channel_pin_added": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_pin_added",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_pin_added\nThe **Message pinned** event triggers when a pin is added to a chat channel.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message pinned** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages`,`team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_pin_added`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object",
                      "by_external_user",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",

    "team_chat.dm_reaction_added": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.dm_reaction_added",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.dm_reaction_added\n\nThe **Team Chat direct reaction added** event triggers when a user sends a reaction under a chat message of a contact and the app is installed for the message receiver user.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team Chat direct reaction added** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:message_emoji`,`team_chat:read:message_emoji:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.dm_reaction_added`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who added the emoji. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who added the emoji. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who added the emoji. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who added the emoji."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the emoji.",
                        "required": [
                          "msg_id",
                          "msg_time",
                          "emoji",
                          "timestamp",
                          "emoji_time",
                          "contact_email",
                          "contact_id",
                          "contact_member_id"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "msg_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of chat message where the emoji was added"
                          },
                          "msg_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was added, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "emoji_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the emoji was added to the message, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "emoji": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "If the emoji is customzied, it returns the emoji's name. If the emoji is default, it will return unicode of this emoji."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the emoji was added to a message."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the emoji was added. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user ID of the contact to whom the emoji was added. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The member ID of the contact to whom the emoji was added."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.dm_reaction_added\",\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\",\n    \"account_id\": \"MMSB9iuRTACkjKlV5C2xuw\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"8AmQ0WOoQ1O3a84yYFc2xQ\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"operator\": \"test@zoom.us\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"contact_member_id\": \"1vCFVGsqi_lo8BqWMfmP8hiRn9a37oxCCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\",\n      \"emoji\": \"test\",\n      \"emoji_time\": 1703821653134,\n      \"msg_time\": \"2023-12-29T03:47:09Z\",\n      \"msg_id\": \"33D478F2-108C-41AA-AB2E-E96535AB4C1C\",\n      \"contact_id\": \"TlrtEHSyQA-fi-RBu2qKEw\",\n      \"contact_email\": \"test@gmail.com\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1703821653134\n    }\n  },\n  \"event_ts\": 1703821653135\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }

    "team_chat.bookmark_removed": {

        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.bookmark_removed",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.bookmark_removed\nThe **Message bookmark removed** event triggers when user removes a bookmark to a message.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message bookmark removed** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_bookmarks`,`team_chat:read:list_bookmarks:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.bookmark_removed`\n",

            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },

                        "description": "The account ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."

                        "description": "The email address of the user who unbookmarked the message."

                      "operator_id": {

                        "description": "The user ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the unbookmarked message.",
                        "required": [
                          "type",
                          "message_id",
                          "message",
                          "message_timestamp",
                          "sender",
                          "sender_id",
                          "sender_member_id",
                          "by_external_user",

                            "description": "The chat channel's ID. Only when the type is to_channel, the payload will include the channel_id."

                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The unbookmarked message's ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The unbookmarked message's content."
                          },
                          "message_timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the unbookmarked message was sent."
                          },
                          "sender": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's email address. If this message was sent by an external user and the type is to_channel, the value of the sender will be an empty string."
                          },
                          "sender_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's user ID. If this message was sent by an external user, the value of the sender_id will be an empty string."

                          "sender_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's member ID."

For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }

                  }

                }

    "team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested": {
      "post": {

        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested\nThe **Team Chat channel join approval requested** event triggers when the channel account or requester account enable the **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option and it needs them to approve the invitation. The event also triggers when it needs the channel owner to approve the join request.\n\nYou can use this event to notify the channel owner admin, requester admin, or channel owner to approve a join request.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested`\n",

Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",

    "team_chat.file_downloaded": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.file_downloaded",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.file_downloaded\nThe **Team Chat file downloaded** event triggers when a user downloads a file sent in the IM chat. The file could be from a contact or a channel.\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* Enable **Event subscriptions** for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* Enable the **Team Chat file downloaded** subscription under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_downloaded`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "The timestamp when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who downloaded the team chat file. This value returns blank for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who downloaded the team chat file. This value returns blank for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who downloaded the team chat file. This value returns blank for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who downloaded the team chat file."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat message file.",
                        "required": [
                          "timestamp",
                          "file"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact. This field only displays when the file was sent in a one-on-one chat between the operator and the contact. This value returns an empty string for external users"
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The file message contact's user ID. This field only display when the file was sent in a one-on-one chat between the operator and the contact. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The file message contact's member ID. This field only displays when the file was sent in a one-on-one chat between the operator and the contact."
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The team chat channel's ID. This field only displays when the file was sent in the chat channel."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp when the message was sent."
                          },
                          "file": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the team chat message file.",
                            "required": [
                              "file_id",
                              "file_name",
                              "file_size",
                              "file_type",
                              "file_owner_member_id"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "file_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The team chat file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format."
                              },
                              "file_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The team chat file's name."
                              },
                              "file_size": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The team chat file's size, in bytes."
                              },
                              "file_type": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The team chat file's type."
                              },
                              "file_owner_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The user ID of the user who uploaded the team chat file. This value returns blank for external users."
                              },
                              "file_owner_member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who uploaded the team chat file."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },

                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false

    "team_chat.dm_message_posted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.dm_message_posted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.dm_message_posted\n\nThe **Team Chat DM message posted** event triggers when a message is received in a DM chat.\n\nUsers can manually send messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also send messages programmatically using the [**Send a Chat Message**](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/chat/methods/#operation/sendaChatMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team Chat DM message posted** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.dm_message_posted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "The Iiformation about the message.",
                        "required": [
                          "message_id",
                          "contact_id",
                          "session_id",
                          "contact_email",
                          "contact_account_id",
                          "contact_member_id",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message's ID."
                          },
                          "reply_main_message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the parent message in the chat thread.It's only available if the message is a reply to a main message in a thread."
                          },
                          "session_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat session's unique ID."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was sent, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's user ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_account_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's account ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's member ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The sent message's content.If this event only occurs when sending a file, the value of the message will not exist."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The attachment file's info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's extension type"
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's message type",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's size, in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages)object. Use this object to include rich text info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "This field is non-null if the value of the format_type field is listed below:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.dm_message_posted\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"R4VM29Oj0fVM2hhEmSKVM2hhezJTezJTKVM2hezJT2hezJ\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"56bed9orRnOSEnBoX_HQvA\",\n          \"file_name\": \"Screenshot 2023-12-22 at 11.21.38 AM.png\",\n          \"file_size\": 23025,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PNG\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"image\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 0,\n          \"end_position\": 10,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"message_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n      \"session_id\": \"abcdefghijklmnop12345\",\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"contact_email\": \"user2@example.com\",\n      \"contact_id\": \"Qc2q-ErlQRaTJAEtu_AV_A\",\n      \"contact_account_id \": \"lmnop12345abcdefghijk\",\n      \"contact_member_id\": \"1vCVTt34UdDPaRg8NYyu7YMEEwu74ADW77aLnDON_C0wJiODRLI82vTwVruPu2LQ\",\n      \"message\": \"this is a test message.\",\n      \"reply_main_message_id\": \"AC619306-3DB6-4918-A11F-DB9489BB814E\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }

    "team_chat.shared_spaces_edited": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.shared_spaces_edited",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.shared_spaces_edited\nThe **Space has been edited** event triggers the settings of shared space changes.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification ndpoint URL**\n\t* The **Space has been edited** subscription must be enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_shared_spaces`,`team_chat:read:list_shared_spaces:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.shared_spaces_edited`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who edited the space. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who who edited the space. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who edited the space. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who edited the space."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "space_id",
                          "new_settings",
                          "old_settings"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "space_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the space."
                          },
                          "new_settings": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the shared space's new settings.",
                            "required": [
                              "name",
                              "desc",
                              "option"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The new/unchanged name of the space."
                              },
                              "desc": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The new/unchanged description of the space."
                              },
                              "option": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "The new/unchanged option of the space.",
                                "required": [
                                  "is_public",
                                  "add_new_members",
                                  "add_new_channels",
                                  "add_external_users"
                                ],
                                "properties": {
                                  "is_public": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether or not the shared space is public."
                                  },
                                  "add_new_members": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Who is able to add members to the shared space.",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "by_owner_and_admins",
                                      "by_any_member"
                                    ]
                                  },
                                  "add_new_channels": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Who is able to add channels to the shared space.",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "by_owner_and_admins",
                                      "by_any_member"
                                    ]
                                  },
                                  "add_external_users": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Who is able to add external users to the shared space, if at all.",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "disabled",
                                      "by_same_org",
                                      "by_owner_and_admins",
                                      "by_any_member"
                                    ]
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "old_settings": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the shared space's old settings.",
                            "required": [
                              "name",
                              "desc",
                              "option"
                            ],

    "chat_channel.updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_channel"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_channel.updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.updated\n\nThe **Chat Channel Updated** event is triggered when a chat channel administrator updates a channel's information. A chat channel administrator can edit a channel's information, such as the channel's name or the channel's type (public or private).\n\nYou can update a chat channel's information manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also update a channel programmatically using the [**Update a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/updateChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Channel Updated** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:channel`,`team_chat:read:channel:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who updated the chat channel."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who updated the chat channel.",
                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "name": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's unique ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel was updated, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format.",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The chat channel's update timestamp."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who updated the chat channel."
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"chat_channel.updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"name\": \"Team Chat\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n\t\t\t\"type\": 1,\n\t\t\t\"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n\t\t\t\"timestamp\": 1581370790388\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {

            "content": {

                "schema": {

                    "event",

                    "payload"
                  ],

                    },
                    "payload": {

                        },
                        "operator": {

                          "format": "email"
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                          "required": [
                            "id",
                            "name",
                            "type",
                            "timestamp",
                            "date_time"
                          ],
                          "properties": {
                            "name": {
                              "description": "The chat channel's name.",
                              "type": "string"
                            },
                            "id": {
                              "description": "The chat channel's unique ID.",
                              "type": "string"
                            },
                            "type": {
                              "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                              "type": "integer",
                              "enum": [
                                1,
                                2,
                                3,
                                4,
                                5
                              ]
                            },
                            "date_time": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel was updated, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format.",
                              "format": "date-time"
                            },

                              "type": "integer",

                          },
                          "additionalProperties": false

                        "operator_id": {

                      },

                  },

                "examples": {

                    "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"chat_channel.updated\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"name\": \"Team Chat\",\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n\t\t\t\"type\": 1,\n\t\t\t\"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n\t\t\t\"timestamp\": 1581370790388\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"

    "team_chat.channel_app_added": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_app_added",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_app_added\nThe **Team Chat channel app added** event triggers when some chat bot apps are added to a chat channel\n\nAny chat channel member can add chat bots to join the channel.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel app added** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_app_added`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who added the chat bot to the chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who added the chat bot to the chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who added the chat bot to the chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who added the chat bot to the chat channel."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "channel_id",
                          "channel_name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time",
                          "members"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "channel_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's name."
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat bot was added to the chat channel, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat bot was added to the chat channel."
                          },
                          "app_members": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "Information about added chat bot app members.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "id",
                                "display_name"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "the chat bot app member\u2019s id."
                                },
                                "display_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The chat bot app display name."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_app_added\",\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"1vAtyRzpld8hX3iJ2JbioUhpXjC2A6TW3UWYGocMh6d3rQTla3I0QFtX_CBZu2aA\",\n    \"account_id\": \"1SjvF2ujQWu7RhCnTwgT4A\",\n    \"operator\": \"xxxxxxx@xxx.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"qF2_be_WRvum8buhfRv7_A\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"channel_name\": \"test18\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"55feed8f37174c11ae4595b8223a932a\",\n      \"type\": 5,\n      \"date_time\": \"2023-12-27T00:54:44Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1703638484590,\n      \"app_members\": [\n        {\n          \"id\": \"v1initnyujsz-sk6c3q7cpxg\",\n          \"display_name\": \"test\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  },\n  \"event_ts\": 1703638484596\n}"

    "chat_channel.created": {

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.created\n\nThe **Chat Channel Created** event is triggered when a user creates a chat channel.\n\nZoom users can create private and public chat channels for group messaging, file sharing, and instant group meetings.\n\nYou can create a chat channel manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also create a channel programmatically using the [**Create a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/createChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Channel Created** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:channel`,`team_chat:read:channel:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.created`\n",
