    "team_chat.channel_invitation_accepted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_invitation_accepted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_invitation_accepted\nThe **Team Chat channel invitation accepted** event triggers when a user accepted the chat channel invitation which previously sent to him .\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel invitation accepted** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_invitation_accepted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who accepted the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who accepted the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who accepted the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who accepted the chat channel invitation."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the invitation.",
                        "required": [
                          "invitee",
                          "inviters",
                          "timestamp"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",

    "chat_channel.member_left": {

        "operationId": "chat_channel.member_left",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.member_left\n\nThe **Member Left** event is triggered when a user leaves a chat channel. A member of a chat channel can leave the channel at any time. After a member leaves a channel, the user loses access to **all** chat channel messages.\n\nMembers can leave a channel manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Members can also leave a channel programmatically using the [**Leave a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/leaveChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Member Left** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_members`,`team_chat:read:list_members:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.member_left`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",

                      "operator",

                        "description": "The account ID of the user who left the chat channel."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",

                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],

Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },

    "team_chat.channel_join_requested": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_requested",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_requested\nThe **Team Chat channel join requested** event triggers when a user requested to join into a team chat channel. One user can request to join a chat channel through deeplink and sharelink. For the deeplink, it's designed for the internal user. The private channel needs the channel owner to approve the request. For the share link, it's both designed for the internal and external user. For the external user, it needs the channel owner and account admin to approve.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel join requested** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_requested`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {

    "team_chat.dm_message_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.dm_message_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.dm_message_updated\n\nThe **Team Chat DM message updated** event triggers when a direct message (DM) chat message is updated.\n\nUsers can manually update messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also update messages programmatically using the [**Update a message**](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/chat/methods/#operation/editMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team Chat DM message updated** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.dm_message_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "The information about the message.",
                        "required": [
                          "message_id",
                          "session_id",
                          "contact_id",
                          "contact_email",
                          "contact_member_id",
                          "contact_account_id",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message's ID."
                          },
                          "reply_main_message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the parent message in the chat thread. It's only available if the message is a reply to a main message in a thread."
                          },
                          "session_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat session's unique ID."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was sent, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's user ID. The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_account_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's account ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's member ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The sent message's content.If this event only occurs when sending a file, the value of the message will not exist."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The attachment file's info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's extension type"
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's message type",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachments file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachments file's size, in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages)object. Use this object to include rich text info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "This field is non-null if the value of the format_type field is listed below:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.dm_message_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"R4VM29Oj0fVM2hhEmSKVM2hhezJTezJTKVM2hezJT2hezJ\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"56bed9orRnOSEnBoX_HQvA\",\n          \"file_name\": \"Screenshot 2023-12-22 at 11.21.38 AM.png\",\n          \"file_size\": 23025,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PNG\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"image\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 0,\n          \"end_position\": 10,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"message_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n      \"session_id\": \"abcdefghijklmnop12345\",\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"contact_email\": \"user2@example.com\",\n      \"contact_id\": \"Qc2q-ErlQRaTJAEtu_AV_A\",\n      \"contact_account_id \": \"lmnop12345abcdefghijk\",\n      \"contact_member_id\": \"1vCVTt34UdDPaRg8NYyu7YMEEwu74ADW77aLnDON_C0wJiODRLI82vTwVruPu2LQ\",\n      \"message\": \"this is a test message.\",\n      \"reply_main_message_id\": \"AC619306-3DB6-4918-A11F-DB9489BB814E\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }

For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                  }

    "chat_message.replied": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_message"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_message.replied",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_message.replied\n\nThe **Chat Message Replied** event is triggered when a user replies to a chat message in a thread. The reply could be to a contact or a channel.\n\nZoom users can reply to messages in a thread using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Message Replied** subscription must be enabled under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_message:read:admin`,`chat_message:write:admin`,`chat_message:read`,`chat_message:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_message.replied`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },

                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who replied to the message."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",

                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the message.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "parent_msg_id",
                          "type",
                          "session_id",
                          "contact_email",
                          "contact_id",
                          "channel_id",
                          "channel_name",
                          "message",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {

                            "description": "The message's unique ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "Whether the message reply was sent to a chat channel or an individual contact: \n* to_contact \u2014 The message was sent to a contact.\n* to_channel \u2014 The message was sent to a chat channel.",
                            "enum": [
                              "to_contact",
                              "to_channel"
                            ]
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The date and time of the message reply, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format.",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The timestamp for the message reply.",
                            "format": "int64"
                          },
                          "session_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat session's unique ID."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the message reply was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user ID of the contact to whom the message reply was sent."
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The unique ID of the channel in which the message reply was sent."
                          },
                          "channel_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The name of the channel in which the message reply was sent."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message reply's contents."
                          },
                          "parent_msg_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The unique ID of the parent message in the chat thread (the chat message to which the message reply was sent)."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who sent the message reply."
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"chat_message.replied\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n\t\t\t\"type\": \"to_channel\",\n\t\t\t\"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n\t\t\t\"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n\t\t\t\"session_id\": \"abcdefghijklmnop12345\",\n\t\t\t\"contact_email\": \"user2@example.com\",\n\t\t\t\"channel_id\": \"qrstuvwxyz67890\",\n\t\t\t\"channel_name\": \"Team Chat\",\n\t\t\t\"message\": \"Hello world.\",\n\t\t\t\"parent_msg_id\": \"DE159sdhmf---dasfC7EBFE73\"\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },

                              "description": "Whether the message reply was sent to a chat channel or an individual contact: \n* to_contact \u2014 The message was sent to a contact.\n* to_channel \u2014 The message was sent to a chat channel.",
                              "enum": [

                            },
                            "date_time": {

                              "format": "date-time"

                            "timestamp": {

                            },

                              "description": "The name of the channel in which the message reply was sent."

    "team_chat.channel_invitation_rejected": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_invitation_rejected",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_invitation_rejected\nThe **Team Chat channel invitation rejected** event triggers when a user rejects the chat channel invitation that was previously sent.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel invitation rejected** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_invitation_rejected`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about invitation.",
                        "required": [
                          "invitee",
                          "inviters",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "invitee": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the invitee.",
                            "required": [
                              "display_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who is invited."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who is invited. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who is invited."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "inviters": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "Information about the inviters.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "user_id",
                                "display_name",
                                "user_email",
                                "member_id",
                                "date_created"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "display_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The display name of the user created the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "user_email": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "email",
                                  "description": "The email address of the user created the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "date_created": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "date-time",
                                  "description": "The date and time at which the user created the chat channel invitation, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel invitation was rejected, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat channel invitation was rejected."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {

          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },

                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],

                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who removed the emoji. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who removed the emoji. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who removed the emoji."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the emoji.",
                        "required": [

    "team_chat.shared_spaces_member_invited": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.shared_spaces_member_invited",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.shared_spaces_member_invited\nThe **Member has been invited** event triggers when a contact is invited to a shared space.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**\n\t* The **Member has been invited** subscription must be enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_shared_space_members`,`team_chat:read:list_shared_space_members:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.shared_spaces_member_invited`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who invited the other user(s). This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who invited the other user(s). This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who invited the other user(s). This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who invited the other user(s)."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the shared space and invited user(s).",
                        "required": [
                          "space_id",
                          "space_name",
                          "members",
                          "timestamp"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "space_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the space the user(s) was/were invited to."
                          },
                          "space_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The name of the space the user(s) was/were invited to."
                          },
                          "members": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The invited members.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "user_id",
                                "user_email",
                                "role",
                                "member_id"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "user_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the invited user. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "user_email": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "email",
                                  "description": "The email address of the invited user. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "display_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The display name of the invited user."
                                },
                                "role": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The role of the invited user: \n* owner \u2014 The space owner. \n* admin \u2014 The space admin. \n* member \u2014 the space member.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "owner",
                                    "admin",
                                    "member"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the invited user."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {

                  "payload"
                ],

                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },

                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."

                        "description": "The email address of the user who unstarred the sessions."

                      "operator_id": {

                        "description": "The user ID of the user who unstarred the sessions."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who unstarred the sessions."

                                  "channel_id": {

                                    "description": "The ID of the channel. Only when the type is channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                                  },
                                  "contact_email": {

                                    "format": "email",
                                    "description": "The email address of the contact. Only when the type is contact, the payload will include the contact_email."

                                  "contact_id": {

    "team_chat.file_unshared": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.file_unshared",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.file_unshared\nThe **Team chat file unshared** event triggers when a user unshares files with a contact or a channel in Team Chat.\n* When users unshare files in a direct message, the system sends a webhook event to the event subscription endpoints of both the sender's and receiver's installed apps.\n* When users unshare files within a channel, the system sends a webhook event to the event subscription endpoints of both the sender's and the channel owner's installed apps.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team chat file unshared** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_unshared`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who unshared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who unshared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who unshared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who unshared the files."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "type",
                          "files"
                        ],
                        "description": "The information about the files.",
                        "properties": {
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The type of the files: \n* to_contact \u2014 The files were sent to a contact. \n* to_channel \u2014 The files were sent to a channel.",
                            "enum": [
                              "to_contact",
                              "to_channel"
                            ]
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the channel to which the files were unshared. Only when the type is to_channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the files were unshared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_email."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user ID of the contact to whom the files were unshared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_id. If this contact is an external user, the contact_id will be an empty string."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The member ID of the contact to whom the files were unshared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_member_id."
                          },
                          "is_external_user": {
                            "type": "boolean",
                            "description": "Whether this contact is an external user. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the is_external_user."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The files' information.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's ID."
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The file's size, in bytes."
                                },
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's extension type."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",

    "team_chat.channel_message_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_message_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_message_updated\n\nThe **Team Chat channel message updated** event triggers when a chat channel message updates.\n\nUsers can manually update messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also update messages programmatically using the [**Update a message**](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/chat/methods/#operation/editMessage) API.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* **Team Chat channel message updated** subscription is enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_message_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "The information about the message.",
                        "required": [
                          "message_id",
                          "session_id",
                          "channel_id",
                          "channel_owner_account_id",
                          "channel_name",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message's ID."
                          },
                          "reply_main_message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the parent message in the chat thread.It's only available if the message is a reply to a main message in a thread."
                          },
                          "session_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat session's unique ID."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was sent, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the message was sent."
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                          },
                          "channel_owner_account_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel owner\u2019s account ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "channel_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's name."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The sent message's content. If this event only occurs when sending a file, the value of the message will not exist."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The attachment file's info in the sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's extension type"
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's message type",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachments file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachments file's size, in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages)object. Use this object to include rich text info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "This field is non-null if the value of the format_type field is listed below:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "at_items": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "This object is to include mentions in the message that was sent to a channel, it includes the mention a contact or mention everyone. ",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "at_type",
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "at_contact": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The email address of the contact. This object is blank for external user or which message is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n",
                                  "format": "email"
                                },
                                "at_contact_user_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the contact. This object is blank for external user or which message is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n"
                                },
                                "at_contact_member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the contact. This object is blank for message which is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n"
                                },
                                "at_type": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The type of mention. You can use one of the following values:  \n \n* 1: Mention a contact. \n\n* 2: Mention &quot;all&quot; to notify everyone in the channel.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    1,
                                    2
                                  ]
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the mention.\n\nExample message: &quot;@Shrijana How are you?&quot;\nIn this case, the end position of the mention &quot;@Shrijana&quot; is 8. Hence, the value of this field will be 8."
                                },
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the mention(&quot;@&quot;) in the message string. \n\nFor example if you want to include the mention at the beginning of the message, the value for this field will be 0. \n\nExample message: &quot;@Shrijana How are you?&quot;"
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_message_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"R4VM29Oj0fVM2hhEmSKVM2hhezJTezJTKVM2hezJT2hezJ\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"56bed9orRnOSEnBoX_HQvA\",\n          \"file_name\": \"Screenshot 2023-12-22 at 11.21.38 AM.png\",\n          \"file_size\": 23025,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PNG\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"image\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 13,\n          \"end_position\": 17,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"at_items\": [\n        {\n          \"at_contact\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n          \"at_contact_user_id\": \"xxxxxx\",\n          \"at_contact_member_id\": \"R4VM29Oj0fVM2hhEmSKVM2hhezJTezJTKVM2hezJT2hezJ\",\n          \"at_type\": 1,\n          \"end_position\": 11,\n          \"start_position\": 0\n        }\n      ],\n      \"message_id\": \"508CD4CF-4FFD-4644-BFB2-264C5C5600D7\",\n      \"session_id\": \"abcdefghijklmnop12345\",\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"channel_id\": \"qrstuvwxyz67890\",\n      \"channel_owner_account_id\": \"lmnop12345abcdefghijk\",\n      \"channel_name\": \"Team Chat\",\n      \"message\": \"@Jill Chill, this is a test message\",\n      \"reply_main_message_id\": \"AC619306-3DB6-4918-A11F-DB9489BB814E\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }

For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"

                            "at_items": {
