                              "description": "This object is to include mentions in the message that was sent to a channel, it includes the mention a contact or mention everyone. ",
                              "items": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "required": [
                                  "at_type",
                                  "start_position",
                                  "end_position"
                                ],
                                "properties": {
                                  "at_contact": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The email address of the contact. This object is blank for external user or which message is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n",
                                    "format": "email"
                                  },
                                  "at_contact_user_id": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The user ID of the contact. This object is blank for external user or which message is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n"
                                  },
                                  "at_contact_member_id": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The member ID of the contact. This object is blank for message which is mentioned to everyone in the channel. \n\n"
                                  },
                                  "at_type": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "description": "The type of mention. You can use one of the following values:  \n \n* 1: Mention a contact. \n\n* 2: Mention &quot;all&quot; to notify everyone in the channel.",
                                    "enum": [
                                      1,
                                      2
                                    ]
                                  },
                                  "end_position": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "description": "The end position of the mention.\n\nExample message: &quot;@Shrijana How are you?&quot;\nIn this case, the end position of the mention &quot;@Shrijana&quot; is 8. Hence, the value of this field will be 8."
                                  },
                                  "start_position": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "description": "The start position of the mention(&quot;@&quot;) in the message string. \n\nFor example if you want to include the mention at the beginning of the message, the value for this field will be 0. \n\nExample message: &quot;@Shrijana How are you?&quot;"
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }

                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }

                },

    "chat_channel.member_removed": {

          "description": "# chat_channel.member_removed\n\nThe **Member Removed** event is triggered when a chat channel member removes a user from the channel. A chat channel administrator or an existing member of a channel can remove channel users. After a member is removed from a channel, the user loses access to **all** chat channel messages.\n\nYou can remove chat channel members manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also remove a member programmatically using the [**Remove a member**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/removeAUserLevelChannelMember) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Member Removed** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_members`,`team_chat:read:list_members:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.member_removed`\n",

Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",

    "team_chat.channel_join_approved": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_approved",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_approved\nThe **Team Chat Channel Join Approved** event triggers when the join request is approved. For the invitation workflow, it needs both admins of the channel owner and requester to approve this when channel account and requester account enable **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option. Also the join requster finally needs the channel owner to approve.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel join approved** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_approved`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who approved the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who approved the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who approved the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who approved the channel join request."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the request.",
                        "required": [
                          "requester",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization.",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "requester": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the requester.",
                            "required": [
                              "user_id",
                              "user_email",
                              "display_name",
                              "member_id"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "user_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The user ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "date_time": {

    "team_chat.bookmark_added": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.bookmark_added",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.bookmark_added\nThe **Message bookmark added** event triggers when user bookmarks a message.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message bookmark added** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_bookmarks`,`team_chat:read:list_bookmarks:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.bookmark_added`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who bookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who bookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who bookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who bookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the bookmarked message.",
                        "required": [
                          "type",
                          "message_id",
                          "message",
                          "message_timestamp",
                          "sender",
                          "sender_id",
                          "sender_member_id",
                          "by_external_user",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The type of message: \n* to_contact \u2014 The message was sent to a contact. \n* to_channel \u2014 The message was sent to a chat channel.",
                            "enum": [
                              "to_contact",
                              "to_channel"
                            ]
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's ID. Only when the type is to_channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                          },
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The bookmarked message's ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The bookmarked message's content."
                          },
                          "message_timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the bookmarked message was sent."
                          },
                          "sender": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's email address. If this message was sent by an external user and the type is to_channel, the value of the sender will be an empty string."
                          },
                          "sender_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's user ID. If this message was sent by an external user, the value of the sender_id will be an empty string."
                          },
                          "sender_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message sender's member ID."
                          },
                          "by_external_user": {
                            "type": "boolean",
                            "description": "Whether this message was sent by an external user."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was bookmarked, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the message was bookmarked."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The files info in the bookmarked message's content. Only when the bookmarked message contains files, the payload will include the files.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {

                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's extension type."
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file ID."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file type.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file size in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages) info included in the bookmarked message. Only when the bookmarked message contains rich texts, the payload will include the rich_text.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "Only when the format_type field is listed below, the payload will include the format_attr:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },

                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.bookmark_added\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1581370790388,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"v4ZZWT1LTfy8QvPG4GTvdgLTfy8QvG4GTWT1LTfy8QvPG4AAAA\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"type\": \"to_channel\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n      \"message_id\": \"BFECE135-6A19-4282-9310-5975675DE6EE\",\n      \"message\": \"Daily Standup Meeting Agenda:\\nWhat did you do yesterday?\\nWhat will you do today?\\nWhat blockers stand in your way?\\nHere\u2019s a daily stand-up template to get you started.\",\n      \"message_timestamp\": 1571370790388,\n      \"sender\": \"user2@example.com\",\n      \"sender_id\": \"bCdMPUWARRWWHL6Cn27tgg\",\n      \"sender_member_id\": \"v4iyWT1LTfy8QvPG4GTvdgLTfy8QvG4GTWT1LTfy8QvPG5ZZZZ\",\n      \"by_external_user\": false,\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 0,\n          \"end_position\": 27,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 30,\n          \"end_position\": 113,\n          \"format_type\": \"BulletedList\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 123,\n          \"end_position\": 145,\n          \"format_type\": \"AddLink\",\n          \"format_attr\": \"https://www.example.com/templates/daily-stand-up\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"PhpAGf6NS5-8GmhMQvd5xw\",\n          \"file_name\": \"slides.pdf\",\n          \"file_size\": 597108,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PDF\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"file\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }

    "team_chat.file_shared": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.file_shared",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.file_shared\nThe **Team chat file shared** event triggers when a user shares files with a contact or a channel in Team Chat.\n* When users share files in a direct message, the system sends a webhook event to the event subscription endpoints of both the sender's and receiver's installed apps.\n* When users share files within a channel, the system sends a webhook event to the event subscription endpoints of both the sender's and the channel owner's installed apps.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team chat file shared** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_shared`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },

                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who shared the files."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "type",
                          "files"
                        ],
                        "description": "The information about the files.",
                        "properties": {
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The type of the files: \n* to_contact \u2014 The files were sent to a contact. \n* to_channel \u2014 The files were sent to a channel.",
                            "enum": [
                              "to_contact",
                              "to_channel"
                            ]
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the channel to which the files were shared. Only when the type is to_channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_email."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user ID of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_id. If this contact is an external user, the contact_id will be an empty string."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The member ID of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_member_id."
                          },
                          "is_external_user": {
                            "type": "boolean",
                            "description": "Whether this contact is an external user. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the is_external_user."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The files' information.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's ID."
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The file's size, in bytes."
                                },
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The file's extension type."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.file_shared\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"V0xKXVARQVmlXMYVbGoTEA\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"type\": \"to_channel\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"qrstuvwxyz67890\",\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n          \"file_name\": \"file1.txt\",\n          \"file_size\": 21,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"TXT\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"7dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n          \"file_name\": \"file2.txt\",\n          \"file_size\": 22,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"TXT\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {

                    },

                      "type": "object",

                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "format": "email",
                          "description": "The email address of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                        },
                        "operator_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The user ID of the user who shared the files. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                        },
                        "operator_member_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The member ID of the user who shared the files."
                        },
                        "by_external_user": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "required": [
                            "type",
                            "files"
                          ],
                          "description": "The information about the files.",
                          "properties": {
                            "type": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The type of the files: \n* to_contact \u2014 The files were sent to a contact. \n* to_channel \u2014 The files were sent to a channel.",
                              "enum": [
                                "to_contact",
                                "to_channel"
                              ]
                            },
                            "channel_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The ID of the channel to which the files were shared. Only when the type is to_channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                            },
                            "contact_email": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "email",
                              "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_email."
                            },
                            "contact_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The user ID of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_id. If this contact is an external user, the contact_id will be an empty string."
                            },
                            "contact_member_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The member ID of the contact to whom the files were shared. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the contact_member_id."
                            },
                            "is_external_user": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "Whether this contact is an external user. Only when the type is to_contact, the payload will include the is_external_user."
                            },
                            "files": {
                              "type": "array",
                              "description": "The files' information.",
                              "items": {

                                "required": [
                                  "OS_file_type",
                                  "file_id",
                                  "file_name",
                                  "file_size"
                                ],
                                "properties": {
                                  "file_id": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The file's ID."
                                  },
                                  "file_name": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The file's name."
                                  },
                                  "file_size": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "description": "The file's size, in bytes."
                                  },
                                  "OS_file_type": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "The file's extension type."
                                  }

                                "additionalProperties": false

                      },

                    }
                  },

                },
                "examples": {

                    "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.file_shared\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"V0xKXVARQVmlXMYVbGoTEA\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"type\": \"to_channel\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"qrstuvwxyz67890\",\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n          \"file_name\": \"file1.txt\",\n          \"file_size\": 21,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"TXT\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"7dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n          \"file_name\": \"file2.txt\",\n          \"file_size\": 22,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"TXT\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"

    "team_chat.channel_invitation_approved": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_invitation_approved",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_invitation_approved\nThe **Team Chat channel invitation approved** event triggers when the inviation is approved. For the invitation workflow, it needs the admin of the channel owner and the invitee to approve when the channel account and invitee account enable the **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option so the invitee can get the invitation.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel invitation approved** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_invitation_approved`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who approved the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who approved the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who approved the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who approved the chat channel invitation."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the invitation.",
                        "required": [
                          "invitee",
                          "inviters",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization.",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "invitee": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the invitee.",
                            "required": [
                              "display_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who is invited."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who is invited. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who is invited."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },

                            "items": {

                              "required": [

                                "display_name",
                                "user_email",
                                "member_id",
                                "date_created"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "user_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "display_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The display name of the user created invited the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "user_email": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "email",
                                  "description": "The email address of the user created invited the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "date_created": {
                                  "type": "string",

                                  "description": "The date and time at which user created the chat channel invitation, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."

                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel invitation was approved, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat channel invitation was approved."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The operation type of this event: \n* by_channel_owner_account_admin \u2014 The invitation is approved or declined by channel owner account admin. \n* by_invitee_account_admin \u2014 The invitation is approved or declined by invitee account admin.",
                            "enum": [
                              "by_channel_owner_account_admin",
                              "by_invitee_account_admin"
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_invitation_approved\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1705009616546,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"1vCFVGsqi_lo8BqWMfmP8hiRn9a37oxCCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\",\n    \"account_id\": \"9_IdLmGATIyUrNmCB4P_zQ\",\n    \"operator\": \"zapp.mobile.admin@ep.test\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"TFq5AiLZSOyuCUpH28gohw\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"organization\":{\n        \"org_id\":\"dsdsd\",\n        \"org_name\": \"dsdsd\"\n      },\n      \"channel\": {\n        \"channel_id\": \"C12345678\",\n        \"channel_name\": \"Test\",\n        \"type\": 5\n      },\n      \"invitee\": {\n        \"display_name\": \"test\",\n        \"user_email\": \"sssss@ss.com\",\n        \"invitee_member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n      },\n      \"inviters\": [\n        {\n          \"user_id\": \"\",\n          \"date_created\": \"2024-01-11T18:55:26Z\",\n          \"display_name\": \"test\",\n          \"user_email\": \"\",\n          \"member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"timestamp\": 324323423423,\n      \"date_time\": \"2024-01-11T19:55:26Z\",\n      \"type\":\"by_invitee_account_admin\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {

            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",

Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel.     "team_chat.file_uploaded": {

        "operationId": "team_chat.file_uploaded",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.file_uploaded\nThis event is triggered when a user uploads files in Team Chat.\n\nThe event is sent to the event subscription endpoints for the installed apps of the user who uploaded the files.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team chat file uploaded** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_uploaded`\n",

              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {

                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },

                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."

                        "description": "The email address of the user who uploaded the files."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who uploaded the files."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who uploaded the files."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "files"
                        ],
                        "description": "Information about the files.",
                        "properties": {

                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The files' information.",
                            "items": {

    "chat_message.sent": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_message"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_message.sent",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_message.sent\n\nThe **Chat Message Sent** event is triggered when a user sends a chat message to a contact or a chat channel.\n\nZoom users can send messages to their contacts and to chat channels if they are a member of the channel. Users can manually send messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also send messages programmatically using the [**Send a Chat Message**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/sendaChatMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Message Sent** subscription enabled under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_message:read:admin`,`chat_message:write:admin`,`chat_message:read`,`chat_message:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_message.sent`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {

    "team_chat.channel_invitation_declined": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_invitation_declined",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_invitation_declined\nThe **Team Chat channel invitation declined** event triggers when the inviation is declined. For the invitation workflow, it both needs admin of channel owner and invitee to approve this when channel account and invitee account enable **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option, so the invitee can get the invitation.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel invitation declined** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_invitation_declined`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who rejected the chat channel invitation."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the invitation.",
                        "required": [
                          "invitee",
                          "inviters",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization.",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "invitee": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the invitee.",
                            "required": [
                              "display_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who is invited."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who is invited. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who is invited."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "inviters": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "Information about the inviters.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "user_id",
                                "display_name",
                                "user_email",
                                "member_id",
                                "date_created"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "user_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "display_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The display name of the user who created invited the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "user_email": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "email",
                                  "description": "The email address of the user who created the chat channel invitation. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                                },
                                "member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the user who created the chat channel invitation."
                                },
                                "date_created": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "date-time",
                                  "description": "The date and time at which user created the chat channel invitation, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel invitation was declined, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat channel invitation was declined."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The operation type of this event: \n* by_channel_owner_account_admin \u2014 The invitation is approved or declined by channel owner account admin. \n* by_invitee_account_admin \u2014 The invitation is approved or declined by invitee account admin.",
                            "enum": [
                              "by_channel_owner_account_admin",
                              "by_invitee_account_admin"
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },

                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false

                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_invitation_declined\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1705009616546,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"1vCFVGsqi_lo8BqWMfmP8hiRn9a37oxCCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\",\n    \"account_id\": \"9_IdLmGATIyUrNmCB4P_zQ\",\n    \"operator\": \"zapp.mobile.admin@ep.test\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"TFq5AiLZSOyuCUpH28gohw\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"organization\": {\n        \"org_id\": \"dsdsd\",\n        \"org_name\": \"dsdsd\"\n      },\n      \"channel\": {\n        \"channel_id\": \"C12345678\",\n        \"channel_name\": \"Test\",\n        \"type\": 5\n      },\n      \"invitee\": {\n        \"display_name\": \"test\",\n        \"user_email\": \"sssss@ss.com\",\n        \"invitee_member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n      },\n      \"inviters\": [\n        {\n          \"user_id\": \"\",\n          \"date_created\": \"2024-01-11T18:55:26Z\",\n          \"display_name\": \"test\",\n          \"user_email\": \"\",\n          \"member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"timestamp\": 324323423423,\n      \"date_time\": \"2024-01-11T19:55:26Z\",\n      \"type\": \"by_invitee_account_admin\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.file_changed\nThis event is triggered when a user changes files in Team Chat.\n\nThe event is sent to the event subscription endpoints of the installed apps for the user who changed the files.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team chat file changed** subscription is enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_changed`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who changed the files."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who changed the files."
                      },

    "team_chat.channel_join_declined": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [

        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_declined",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_declined\nThe **Team Chat channel join declined** event triggers when the join request is declined. For the invitation workflow, it both needs the admin of the channel owner and requester to approve when the channel account and requester account enable the **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option. Also the join requster finally needs the channel owner to approve.\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Team Chat channel join declined** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_declined`\n",

                        "description": "The email address of the user who declined the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."

                        "description": "The user ID of the user who declined the channel join request. This value returns an empty string for external users."

Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
