    "chat_channel.member_joined": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_channel"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_channel.member_joined",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.member_joined\n\nThe **Member Joined** event is triggered when a user manually joins a public chat channel or joins via the [**Join a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/joinChannel) API. Users can also manually join public chat channels using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. This event does **not** trigger if someone invites the user join the channel.\n\nZoom users can search for public chat channels created by other users in the same Zoom account and join those channels.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Member Joined** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_members`,`team_chat:read:list_members:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.member_joined`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who joined the chat channel."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who joined the chat channel.",
                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "name": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's unique ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the user joined the chat channel, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format.",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the user joined the chat channel."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who joined the chat channel."
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {

When a user deletes a message, the message recipients will no longer be able to view the message. Users can manually delete messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also delete messages programmatically using the [**Delete a Message**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/deleteChatMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Message Deleted** subscription enabled under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_message:read:admin`,`chat_message:write:admin`,`chat_message:read`,`chat_message:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_message.deleted`\n",

    "team_chat.emoji_removed": {

        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.emoji_removed",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.emoji_removed\nThe **Custom emoji removed** event is triggered when a user removes a custom emoji.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Custom emoji removed** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_custom_emojis`,`team_chat:read:list_custom_emojis:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.emoji_removed`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {

                  },

                      "object": {

                        "description": "Information about the custom emoji.",
                        "properties": {

                }
              }
            }
          }
        },

    "team_chat.channel_pin_added": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_pin_added",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_pin_added\nThe **Message pinned** event triggers when a pin is added to a chat channel.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message pinned** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages`,`team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_pin_added`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object",
                      "by_external_user",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who pinned the chat message. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who pinned the chat message."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel and the pinned message.",
                        "required": [
                          "message_id",
                          "message",
                          "message_timestamp",
                          "channel_name",
                          "channel_id",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "channel_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's name."
                          },
                          "channel_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The pinned message's ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The pinned message's content."
                          },
                          "message_timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the pinned message was sent."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat message was pinned, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat message was pinned."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The files info in the pinned message's content. Only when the pinned message contains files, the payload will include the files.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's extension type."
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file ID."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file type.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachment's file size in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages) info included in the pinned message. Only when the pinned message contains rich texts, the payload will include the rich_text.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "Only when the format_type field is listed below, the payload will include the format_attr:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_pin_added\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1581370790388,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"V0xKXVARQVmlXMYVbGoTEA\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"channel_name\": \"Team Chat\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n      \"type\": 5,\n      \"message_id\": \"BFECE135-6A19-4282-9310-5975675DE6EE\",\n      \"message\": \"Daily Standup Meeting Agenda:\\nWhat did you do yesterday?\\nWhat will you do today?\\nWhat blockers stand in your way?\\nHere\u2019s a daily stand-up template to get you started.\",\n      \"message_timestamp\": 1571370790388,\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 0,\n          \"end_position\": 27,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 30,\n          \"end_position\": 113,\n          \"format_type\": \"BulletedList\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 123,\n          \"end_position\": 145,\n          \"format_type\": \"AddLink\",\n          \"format_attr\": \"https://www.example.com/templates/daily-stand-up\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"PhpAGf6NS5-8GmhMQvd5xw\",\n          \"file_name\": \"slides.pdf\",\n          \"file_size\": 597108,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PDF\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"file\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "operator",
                        "operator_id",
                        "object",
                        "by_external_user",
                        "operator_member_id"

Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                              "enum": [

                              "description": "The timestamp for when the pinned message was sent."
                            },

                                      "BulletedList",

                                      "Underline",

                                      "FontColor",
                                      "BackgroundColor",
                                      "LeftIndent",
                                      "Paragraph",
                                      "Quote",
                                      "AddLink"
                                    ]
                                  },

                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Only when the format_type field is listed below, the payload will include the format_attr:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                  }
                                },
                                "additionalProperties": false
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                      },
                      "additionalProperties": false
                    }
                  },

                },
                "examples": {

                    "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_pin_added\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1581370790388,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"V0xKXVARQVmlXMYVbGoTEA\",\n    \"by_external_user\": false,\n    \"object\": {\n      \"channel_name\": \"Team Chat\",\n      \"channel_id\": \"6dfgdfgdg444447b0egga\",\n      \"type\": 5,\n      \"message_id\": \"BFECE135-6A19-4282-9310-5975675DE6EE\",\n      \"message\": \"Daily Standup Meeting Agenda:\\nWhat did you do yesterday?\\nWhat will you do today?\\nWhat blockers stand in your way?\\nHere\u2019s a daily stand-up template to get you started.\",\n      \"message_timestamp\": 1571370790388,\n      \"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n      \"rich_text\": [\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 0,\n          \"end_position\": 27,\n          \"format_type\": \"Bold\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 30,\n          \"end_position\": 113,\n          \"format_type\": \"BulletedList\"\n        },\n        {\n          \"start_position\": 123,\n          \"end_position\": 145,\n          \"format_type\": \"AddLink\",\n          \"format_attr\": \"https://www.example.com/templates/daily-stand-up\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"files\": [\n        {\n          \"file_id\": \"PhpAGf6NS5-8GmhMQvd5xw\",\n          \"file_name\": \"slides.pdf\",\n          \"file_size\": 597108,\n          \"OS_file_type\": \"PDF\",\n          \"file_message_type\": \"file\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"

                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"

                    "type": "string",

                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_archived\nThe **Chat channel archived** event triggers when a chat channel owner archives the channel.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat channel archived** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:archive_channels`,`team_chat:read:archive_channels:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_archived`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who archived the chat channel. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who archived the chat channel. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who archived the chat channel. If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who archived the chat channel."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {

                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's name."
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },

                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",

                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the chat channel was archived."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false

                },

        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.bookmark_removed",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.bookmark_removed\nThe **Message bookmark removed** event triggers when user removes a bookmark to a message.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message bookmark removed** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_bookmarks`,`team_chat:read:list_bookmarks:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.bookmark_removed`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."

                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",

                        "description": "The email address of the user who unbookmarked the message."

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who unbookmarked the message."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the unbookmarked message.",
                        "required": [

                            "description": "The unbookmarked message's ID."

For example: https://example.com"

    "team_chat.channel_pin_removed": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_pin_removed",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_pin_removed\nThe **Message unpinned** event triggers when a pin is removed from a chat channel.\n\nIf the [**Store messages in Zoom's cloud setting**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060329) is disabled, this webhook will not be triggered.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Message unpinned** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages`,`team_chat:read:list_pinned_messages:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_pin_removed`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",

    "team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested\nThe **Team Chat channel join approval requested** event triggers when the channel account or requester account enable the **[Require admin approval for inviting external users in group chats and channels](https://zoom.us/account/setting)** option and it needs them to approve the invitation. The event also triggers when it needs the channel owner to approve the join request.\n\nYou can use this event to notify the channel owner admin, requester admin, or channel owner to approve a join request.\n\n## Prerequisites\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_invitations`,`team_chat:read:list_invitations:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the request.",
                        "required": [
                          "requester",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "organization": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about organization of channel owner. This object is blank for external organization.",
                            "required": [
                              "org_id",
                              "org_name"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "org_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's ID."
                              },
                              "org_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The organization's name."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "channel": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel. This object is blank for external channel.",
                            "required": [
                              "channel_id",
                              "channel_name",
                              "type"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "channel_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's ID."
                              },
                              "channel_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The chat channel's name."
                              },
                              "type": {
                                "type": "integer",
                                "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                                "enum": [
                                  1,
                                  2,
                                  3,
                                  4,
                                  5
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "requester": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the requester.",
                            "required": [
                              "user_id",
                              "user_email",
                              "display_name",
                              "member_id"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "user_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The user ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "display_name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The display name of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              },
                              "user_email": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "format": "email",
                                "description": "The email address of the user who requested to join this chat channel. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                              },
                              "member_id": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The member ID of the user who requested to join this chat channel."
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which this approval request is sent, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when this approval request is sent."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The type of this approval request: \n* to_requester_account_admin \u2014 The request needs approval of requster account admin. \n* to_channel_account_admin \u2014 The request needs approval of channel owner account admin. \n* to_channel_owner \u2014 The request needs approval of channel owner.",
                            "enum": [
                              "to_channel_account_admin",
                              "to_requester_account_admin",
                              "to_channel_owner"
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },

                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.channel_join_approval_requested\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1705009616546,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"object\": {\n      \"organization\": {\n        \"org_id\": \"dsdsd\",\n        \"org_name\": \"dsdsd\"\n      },\n      \"channel\": {\n        \"channel_id\": \"C12345678\",\n        \"channel_name\": \"Test\",\n        \"type\": 5\n      },\n      \"requester\": {\n        \"user_id\": \"\",\n        \"display_name\": \"test\",\n        \"user_email\": \"\",\n        \"member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n      },\n      \"type\": \"to_channel_admin\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1705009616546,\n      \"date_time\": \"2024-01-11T19:55:26Z\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }

The file could be from a contact or a channel.\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* Enable **Event subscriptions** for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* Enable the **Team Chat file downloaded** subscription under the **Chat Message** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:file`,`team_chat:read:file:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.file_downloaded`\n",

                                "description": "The team chat file's size, in bytes."

                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false

                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }

                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"team_chat.file_downloaded\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"operator_member_id\": \"1vCFVGsqi_lo8BqWMfmP8hiRn9a37oxCCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"channel_id\": \"4c74c0e3763940408cd0515a332ea4f5@conference.xmppdev.zoom.us\",\n      \"timestamp\": 1700515073431,\n      \"file\": {\n        \"file_id\": \"MS17RDk0QTY3QUQtQkFGQy04QTJFLTI2RUEtNkYxQjRBRTU1MTk5fQ==\",\n        \"file_name\": \"example.jpg\",\n        \"file_size\": 3966,\n        \"file_type\": \"jpg\",\n        \"file_owner_id\": \"8AmQ0WOoQ1O3a84yYFc2xQ\",\n        \"file_owner_member_id\": \"1vRFhZt_2gipkB-SFKkOpnkhWpeSf1wiCPYdRWctkgMaE9NWn66sJouoz8opRcsg\"\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }

            }

                            },
                            "contact_id": {

                              "description": "The file message contact's user ID. This field only display when the file was sent in a one-on-one chat between the operator and the contact. This value returns an empty string for external users."
                            },
                            "contact_member_id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The file message contact's member ID. This field only displays when the file was sent in a one-on-one chat between the operator and the contact."
                            },
                            "channel_id": {

                              "description": "The team chat channel's ID. This field only displays when the file was sent in the chat channel."
                            },

                              "type": "integer",

    "team_chat.dm_message_posted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.dm_message_posted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.dm_message_posted\n\nThe **Team Chat DM message posted** event triggers when a message is received in a DM chat.\n\nUsers can manually send messages using the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Users can also send messages programmatically using the [**Send a Chat Message**](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/chat/methods/#operation/sendaChatMessage) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Team Chat DM message posted** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:user_message`,`team_chat:read:user_message:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.dm_message_posted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "account_id",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id",
                      "by_external_user"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the account_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who triggered the action.If this action is performed by an external user, the value of the operator_id will be an empty string."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who triggered the action."
                      },
                      "by_external_user": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Whether this action was performed by an external user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "The Iiformation about the message.",
                        "required": [
                          "message_id",
                          "contact_id",
                          "session_id",
                          "contact_email",
                          "contact_account_id",
                          "contact_member_id",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message's ID."
                          },
                          "reply_main_message_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The ID of the parent message in the chat thread.It's only available if the message is a reply to a main message in a thread."
                          },
                          "session_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The chat session's unique ID."
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the message was sent, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format."
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The timestamp for when the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The email address of the contact to whom the message was sent."
                          },
                          "contact_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's user ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_account_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's account ID.The value will be an empty string if this info is from an external user."
                          },
                          "contact_member_id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The message contact's member ID."
                          },
                          "message": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The sent message's content.If this event only occurs when sending a file, the value of the message will not exist."
                          },
                          "files": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The attachment file's info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "OS_file_type",
                                "file_id",
                                "file_message_type",
                                "file_name",
                                "file_size"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "OS_file_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's extension type"
                                },
                                "file_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format."
                                },
                                "file_message_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's message type",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "file",
                                    "image",
                                    "audio",
                                    "audio v2",
                                    "code snippet",
                                    "screen shot"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "file_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's name."
                                },
                                "file_size": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The attachment file's size, in bytes."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          },
                          "rich_text": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The [rich text formatting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004789183-Replying-to-and-managing-chat-messages)object. Use this object to include rich text info in sent message's content.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "start_position",
                                "end_position",
                                "format_type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "start_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The start position of the rich text in the message string. \n\nFor example if the first character at the beginning of the message is bold, the value for this field will be 0."
                                },
                                "end_position": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The end position of the rich text."
                                },
                                "format_type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The type of rich text.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Bold",
                                    "Italic",
                                    "Strikethrough",
                                    "BulletedList",
                                    "NumberedList",
                                    "Underline",
                                    "FontSize",
                                    "FontColor",
                                    "BackgroundColor",
                                    "LeftIndent",
                                    "Paragraph",
                                    "Quote",
                                    "AddLink"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "format_attr": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "This field is non-null if the value of the format_type field is listed below:\n\n1.FontSize value: s for small, m for medium, or l for large font size. \n\n2.FontColor and BackgroundColor value: only supports RGB value. For example: FFC0CB \n\n3.LeftIndent value: a positive pixel length.  \n\n4.Paragraph value: h1 for Heading 1, h2 for Heading 2, or h3 for Heading 3. \n\n5.AddLink value: must be a valid URL, with an http or https prefix. For example: https://example.com"
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {

          "description": "# team_chat.shared_spaces_edited\nThe **Space has been edited** event triggers the settings of shared space changes.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification ndpoint URL**\n\t* The **Space has been edited** subscription must be enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_shared_spaces`,`team_chat:read:list_shared_spaces:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.shared_spaces_edited`\n",

    "chat_channel.updated": {

A chat channel administrator can edit a channel's information, such as the channel's name or the channel's type (public or private).\n\nYou can update a chat channel's information manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also update a channel programmatically using the [**Update a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/updateChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Channel Updated** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:channel`,`team_chat:read:channel:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.updated`\n",

                        ],

Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",

    "team_chat.starred": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "team_chat"
        ],
        "operationId": "team_chat.starred",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# team_chat.starred\nThe **Session starred** event triggers when user stars some contacts and channels.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event notification endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Session starred** subscription enabled under the **Team Chat** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat:read:admin`,`chat:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:chat_control`,`team_chat:read:chat_control:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `team_chat.starred`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id",
                      "operator_member_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who starred the sessions."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who starred the sessions."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who starred the sessions."
                      },
                      "operator_member_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The member ID of the user who starred the sessions."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the starred sessions.",
                        "required": [
                          "items",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "items": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "The sessions' info.",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "required": [
                                "type"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The session's type.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "contact",
                                    "channel"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "channel_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The ID of the channel. Only when the type is channel, the payload will include the channel_id."
                                },
                                "contact_email": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "format": "email",
                                  "description": "The email address of the contact. Only when the type is contact, the payload will include the contact_email."
                                },
                                "contact_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user ID of the contact. Only when the type is contact, the payload will include the contact_id. If this contact is an external user, the contact_id will be an empty string."
                                },
                                "contact_member_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The member ID of the contact. Only when the type is contact, the payload will include the contact_member_id."
                                },
                                "is_external_user": {
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "description": "Whether this contact is an external user. Only when the type is contact, the payload will include the is_external_user."
                                }
                              },
                              "additionalProperties": false
                            }

    "chat_channel.created": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "chat_channel"
        ],
        "operationId": "chat_channel.created",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# chat_channel.created\n\nThe **Chat Channel Created** event is triggered when a user creates a chat channel.\n\nZoom users can create private and public chat channels for group messaging, file sharing, and instant group meetings.\n\nYou can create a chat channel manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. You can also create a channel programmatically using the [**Create a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/createChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Chat Channel Created** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:channel`,`team_chat:read:channel:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.created`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who created the chat channel."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who created the chat channel.",
                        "format": "email"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name",
                          "type",
                          "timestamp",
                          "date_time",
                          "members"
                        ],
                        "description": "Information about the chat channel.",
                        "properties": {
                          "name": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's name.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The chat channel's unique ID.",
                            "type": "string"
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "description": "The type of chat channel: \n* 1 \u2014 Private chat channel. Only invited members can join. \n* 2 \u2014 Private chat channel with the same account. Only invited members who are in the same Zoom account as the chat channel's creator can join. \n* 3 \u2014 Public chat channel. Anyone can search for and join this chat channel. \n* 4 \u2014 An instant channel. This type of channel is created by adding members to a new chat. \n* 5 \u2014 A public channel. Anyone can join this channel and invite members from other Zoom accounts.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2,
                              3,
                              4,
                              5
                            ]
                          },
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the chat channel was created, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' format.",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          },
                          "timestamp": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "format": "int64",
                            "description": "The chat channel's creation timestamp."
                          },
                          "members": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "Information about the chat channel's members.",
                            "items": {
                              "anyOf": [
                                {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "required": [
                                    "id",
                                    "display_name"
                                  ],
                                  "properties": {
                                    "id": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "The member's unique ID."
                                    },
                                    "display_name": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "The member's display name."
                                    }
                                  },
                                  "additionalProperties": false
                                }
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who created the chat channel."
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n\t\"event\": \"chat_channel.created\",\n\t\"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n\t\"payload\": {\n\t\t\"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n\t\t\"operator\": \"user@example.com\",\n\t\t\"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n\t\t\"object\": {\n\t\t\t\"name\": \"Team Chat\",\n\t\t\t\"type\": 1,\n\t\t\t\"date_time\": \"2020-02-10T21:39:50Z\",\n\t\t\t\"timestamp\": 1581370790388,\n\t\t\t\"members\": [\n\t\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t\t\"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n\t\t\t\t\t\"display_name\": \"Tara Smith\"\n\t\t\t\t},\n\t\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t\t\"id\": \"hijK4lmnopqrs\",\n\t\t\t\t\t\"display_name\": \"Sasha Taylor\"\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t]\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}"

          "description": "# chat_channel.member_left\n\nThe **Member Left** event is triggered when a user leaves a chat channel. A member of a chat channel can leave the channel at any time. After a member leaves a channel, the user loses access to **all** chat channel messages.\n\nMembers can leave a channel manually using either the Zoom desktop client or the Zoom mobile app. Members can also leave a channel programmatically using the [**Leave a Channel**](/api-reference/chat/methods#operation/leaveChannel) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or a higher [plan](https://zoom.us/pricing).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [OAuth app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/getting-started/app-types/create-oauth-app) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Member Left** subscription enabled under the **Chat Channel** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `chat_channel:read:admin`,`chat_channel:write:admin`,`chat_channel:read`,`chat_channel:write`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `team_chat:read:list_members`,`team_chat:read:list_members:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `chat_channel.member_left`\n",
